heroTitle: A Journey of Healing and Transformation
heroSubtitle1: Discover the power of ancestral medicine to heal, grow, and connect with your true self. We offer a safe and sacred space for your transformation.
heroSubtitle2: Each ceremony is an opportunity to release what no longer serves you and embrace a new way of living.
upcomingCeremoniesSubtitle: Join us on a journey of deep healing. Each ceremony is designed to guide you towards greater connection and clarity.
editCeremonyDescription: Modify the ceremony details. Changes will be reflected immediately.
addCeremonyDescription: Create a new ceremony for users to see and register for.
mediaRequiredDescription: You must provide a media URL or upload a file.
pastCeremoniesSubtitle: Relive the magic and transformation of our past gatherings. Each video is a testament to the power of community and healing.
addVideoDescription: Add a new video to the memories collection.
videoFormUrlOrUpload: Please enter a video URL or upload a file.
deleteVideoConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the video.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a transformative experience. Discover how to align your body, mind, and spirit for the ceremony.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social media channels and stay up to date with our upcoming ceremonies, retreats, and valuable content for your spiritual path.
footerText: Â© {year} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the dedicated individuals who will accompany you on your journey. Each of our guides brings deep wisdom, compassion, and experience to hold a safe and sacred space.
editGuideDescription: Update the guide's information. The changes will be saved to the database.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the guide.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred medicine used for centuries by indigenous cultures of the Amazon for physical, emotional, and spiritual healing. It is a decoction of two plants, the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and Chacruna leaves (Psychotria viridis), which together activate a powerful experience of introspection and connection.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: Ayahuasca works on a deep level, cleansing the body of toxins and the mind of negative patterns. It facilitates access to expanded states of consciousness, allowing for the healing of traumas, the release of emotional blockages, and a profound understanding of oneself and the universe.
spiritualMasterDescription: More than a substance, Ayahuasca is considered a spiritual teacher or a living consciousness that guides the participant through their inner journey. It teaches with visions, emotions, and revelations, showing what needs to be healed and revealing the potential of each individual.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many participants report greater clarity about their life purpose, relationships, and path forward. The medicine helps dissolve confusion and connect with inner wisdom.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Ayahuasca allows for the confrontation and healing of deep-seated traumas and emotional wounds, often releasing burdens that have affected a person for years.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: The experience often fosters a sense of unity and connection with nature, the universe, and all forms of life, reducing feelings of isolation and fear.
groupCeremonyDescription: A shared space where the group's energy amplifies healing. Ideal for connecting with others on a similar journey.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized experience, designed to address specific needs with focused attention from the guides.
preparationProcessDescription: Start a clean diet and set your intentions.
ceremonyProcessDescription: Participate in the sacred ritual guided by our facilitators.
experienceProcessDescription: Navigate your inner journey in a safe and supportive space.
integrationProcessDescription: Apply the teachings of the medicine in your daily life.
dietTitle: Sacred Diet: The Body as a Temple
dietSubtitle: Physical preparation is fundamental. A clean and specific diet, at least one week before the ceremony, purifies your body and prepares it to receive the medicine.
allowedFoodsList: Whole grains like brown rice, quinoa, and oats
Grilled or steamed white fish (in moderation)
Pure water and caffeine-free herbal teas
prohibitedFoodsList: Fried, processed, or high-sugar and high-salt foods
Caffeine, alcohol, and other psychoactive substances
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your mental and emotional state is as important as your physical state. Dedicate time to introspection before the ceremony.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and increase your receptivity. Silence helps you listen to your inner voice.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you seek to heal or understand. A clear intention acts as a guide during your experience.
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes. This process helps you clarify your current state and your desires for transformation.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can bring repressed emotions to the surface. Prepare to be vulnerable and allow yourself to feel without judgment. Trust that everything that arises is for your highest good and healing. Our team is here to support you every step of the way.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Dress in comfortable clothes and prepare for a night of deep introspection.
comfortItemsList: Comfortable and warm clothing in layers (you might feel cold)
A yoga mat, blankets, and pillows for your 'nest'
A journal and pen to jot down reflections
essentialsList: Respect for the process, the guides, and other participants
Trust in the medicine and in yourself
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to continue your journey.
loginSuccessDescription: Welcome back to The Art of Healing!
registerSubtext: Join our community to access exclusive content.
registerContinueWith: Or sign up with your email
registerSuccessDescription: Welcome! Please check your email to verify your account.
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to access exclusive content, like detailed preparation guides and our pre-ceremony questionnaire.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage the application's content, users, and settings.
profileTabDescription: Update your contact information that might be visible on the site.
themeTabDescription: Adjust the application's colors. Use HSL values (e.g., 150 40% 45%).
userManagementSubtitle: Manage user roles and communicate with them.
allUsersDescription: Here you can view and manage all users of the platform.
sendEmailDescription: Communicate with your entire community via a bulk email.
chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am your Spiritual Guide. I am here to help you on your healing journey. How can I guide you today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again later.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review the conversations between users and the spiritual guide.
allConversationsDescription: Here you can find a record of all interactions with the chatbot.
questionnaireDescription: Your safety and well-being are our priority. Please answer the following questions with complete honesty. This information is confidential and will help us ensure you have a safe and beneficial experience.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any pre-existing medical conditions (heart problems, high/low blood pressure, respiratory disorders, epilepsy, etc.)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any prescription medications (especially SSRI/MAOI antidepressants), supplements, or herbal remedies?
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a personal or family history of significant mental health conditions (such as schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireExperience: Do you have any previous experience with Ayahuasca or other psychedelic medicines?
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in the ceremony? What do you hope to heal, understand, or explore?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: e.g., I'm looking to heal a past wound, find my purpose, connect with my spirituality...
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your answers have been saved securely. Thank you for your honesty.
questionnaireErrorDescription: Could not save your answers. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to access this page.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: These are the answers provided by the user.
noAnswersSubmitted: This user has not submitted the questionnaire yet.
